original_title: 18 government sector TUs launch sick leave campaign
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); 18 trade unions of the government's executive level have launched a sick leave campaign on Monday (29).
The union action was launched based on several demands including salary anomalies.
They are scheduled to hold a special conference and protest rally on Monday (29) afternoon.
